synopsis.text:
These synopses introduce us to the magical world of Ojamajo Doremi, focusing on the character Hana-chan in its fourth season. After growing up in Maho-land with magical abilities, Hana-chan decides to attend school with her friends Doremi, Onpu, Momoko, Hadzuki, and Aiko by using her powers to age herself. However, this causes her to lose her magic crystals and her status as a witch.

To regain her magic, Hana-chan must complete the witch apprentice exams and face various challenges alongside her friends. One of their main missions is to break the curse of Majotourbillon, a spirit causing depression in both the human and witch worlds by spreading bad memories.

With guidance from the Witch Queen and the help of Pao-chan, the witches work together to defeat the curses and save their former queen. Along the way, Hana-chan must decide whether to remain human and stay with her loved ones or become an immortal witch and live in the witch world.

This season of Ojamajo Doremi explores the remaining secrets of the series and brings closure to the anime, all while showcasing the growth and determination of Hana-chan and her friends as they navigate the magical world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
